text: In order for the ECS data to be processable, it has to be assigned to a Reprocessing Group and be in status New . The Reprocessing Group is then selected in the ECS collection agent of the reprocessing workflow. To create a Reprocessing Group, click the Reprocessing Groups button in the ECS Inspector. Open ECS Reprocessing Group dialog Click the Add button to display the Add ECS Reprocessing Group dialog. The Reprocessing Group must have a unique name. Open Add ECS Reprocessing Group dialog The setting Error UDR Type is only applicable to Data Type Batch . If no Error UDR is to be used in reprocessing, this information is not required. Note! UDRs with several Error Codes mapped to different reprocessing groups cannot be automatically assigned to a reprocessing group. They must be assigned manually.
title: ECS Reprocessing Groups - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
